extendedInfo.description: The Romans Road to Salvation is a series of bible verses from the New Testament book of Romans.Referencing these verses is a simple and powerful way of explaining salvation.Christians now have these popular scriptures available on their Android device and presented in a "Road sign" theme to help capture their audiences.

reviews.title: Nice, creative, presentation of RR
reviews.comment: This app is a nice, straightforward, graphical presentation of the Bible verses of the \"Romans Road\" to salvation.  Everything about the app is great.  But the only (and maybe default) option I would give the user is the selection of Bible version.  It might reach a wider audience that way.  Copyright issues might be involved, but you could probably get permission for the English Standard Version. And, if not, the  public domain World English Bible or the NET version might be options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect tool to share the gospel. While some may feel intimidated if you open a Bible, everyone likes to look at something on your phone screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Need to improve by alot. Should at least runs with animation before considering charging user. Disappointed :( Go chk out AppleApps \" oneverse
reviews.author: A Google User
